definitions.definition: A device that generates heat , light or other radiation . Especially an electric light bulb .
A device containing oil , burnt through a wick for illumination ; an oil lamp .
A piece of furniture holding one or more electric light sockets.

main_definition: A device that generates heat , light or other radiation . Especially an electric light bulb .
secondary_definitions: A device containing oil , burnt through a wick for illumination ; an oil lamp .
A piece of furniture holding one or more electric light sockets.
